tool_description: The "Text Translator" API provides fast and precise multilingual translation services. It includes real-time translation, language detection, and text-to-speech conversion for seamless integration into your applications. Access extensive language support and comprehensive documentation to effortlessly expand your global reach.
name: Text Translator
title: Text Translator

api_list.name: translate

required_parameters.name: target_lang
required_parameters.description: enter language code of target language ( you can get language code here : https://cloud.google.com/translate/docs/languages)

api_list.name: detect

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Please provide the text for which you want to detect the language.
